mapper.select: SELECT p.productName, SUM(o.orderPrice) AS totalPrice, o.orderIdx, o.orderNumber, o.orderPrice, c.couponName, o.orderStatus FROM `order` AS o LEFT JOIN product p ON o.productIdx = p.productIdx LEFT JOIN coupon c ON o.couponIdx = c.couponIdx WHERE DATE(o.orderDate) = CURDATE() GROUP BY p.productName, o.orderIdx, o.orderNumber, o.orderPrice, c.couponName, o.orderStatus ORDER BY o.orderStatus ASC, o.orderNumber DESC;
